com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.swinginadapters

Class AnimationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.BaseAdapterDecorator
        • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.swinginadapters.AnimationAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SectionIndexer, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, ListViewWrapperSetter, Swappable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlphaInAnimationAdapter, ResourceAnimationAdapter, ScaleInAnimationAdapter, SingleAnimationAdapter

    public abstract class AnimationAdapter
extends BaseAdapterDecorator
    A BaseAdapterDecorator class which applies multiple Animators at once to views when they are first shown. The Animators applied include the animations specified in getAnimators(ViewGroup, View), plus an alpha transition.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

    • Method Detail

      • setListViewWrapper

        public void setListViewWrapper(ListViewWrapper listViewWrapper)
        Description copied from class: BaseAdapterDecorator
        Alternative to BaseAdapterDecorator.setAbsListView(android.widget.AbsListView). Sets the ListViewWrapper which contains the ListView this adapter will be bound to. Call this method before setting this adapter to the ListView. Also propagates to the decorated BaseAdapter if applicable.
        Specified by:
        setListViewWrapper in interface ListViewWrapperSetter
        Overrides:
        setListViewWrapper in class BaseAdapterDecorator

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Call this method to reset animation status on all views. The next time BaseAdapterDecorator.notifyDataSetChanged() is called on the base adapter, all views will animate again.

      • getViewAnimator

        public ViewAnimator getViewAnimator()
        Returns the ViewAnimator responsible for animating the Views in this adapter.

      • getView

        public final android.view.View getView(int position,
                        android.view.View convertView,
                        android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Specified by:
        getView in interface android.widget.Adapter
        Overrides:
        getView in class BaseAdapterDecorator

      • getAnimators

        public abstract com.nineoldandroids.animation.Animator[] getAnimators(android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                                                    android.view.View view)
        Returns the Animators to apply to the views. In addition to the returned Animators, an alpha transition will be applied to the view.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent of the view
        view - The view that will be animated, as retrieved by getView().

      • onSaveInstanceState

        public android.os.Parcelable onSaveInstanceState()
        Returns a Parcelable object containing the AnimationAdapter's current dynamic state.

      • onRestoreInstanceState

        public void onRestoreInstanceState(android.os.Parcelable parcelable)
        Restores this AnimationAdapter's state.
        Parameters:
        parcelable - the Parcelable object previously returned by onSaveInstanceState().
